annonstext:
In the ever-expanding world of digitizing, we secure the new society that emerges. Nexus’ Smart ID solutions and IoT platforms are transforming how we perceive trusted identities. That journey begins with our awesome engineering teams. We are looking to strengthen our team with a cloud-native Java developer.

We are in the middle of a journey transforming not only how we look at IT security but also how others perceive us as a company. We are expanding our on-premises based technology, to a more agile, cloud-based solution. Do you want to be part of that journey and help us find new ways to handle millions of credentials supporting the new IoT solutions that are transforming our world?

Shrinkhla Kishore, head of our Certificate Management team is looking for a Java developer with strong cloud present, to join us in our Stockholm location.

What will you be doing at Nexus?

Nexus  SmartID Certificate Manager (https://doc.nexusgroup.com/display/PUB/Smart+ID+Certificate+Manager) is a flexible and scalable Certificate Authority (CA) software portfolio and is fast growing in the use of Internet of Things (IoT). It’s used for managing electronic identities for intelligent cars, charging infrastructure, telecommunication devices and many other things. To grow with the market, we need to become even better in deploying to the cloud, deliver it as a Service and modernizing the code.

Therefore, we are looking for a strong Java developer who would like to be a DevOps evangelist within the team. This mean that you will help and drive the DevOps story whenever you get a chance and to ensure that the team has the knowledge they need, because this is not a one man show and we move forward as a unit. The role is all about enabling the team to move forward in this journey.

Your main focus will of course be the day-to-day feature driven development we all do and you will take part of all the steps of the Scrum cycle, from sprint planning to retros.

We work close with the customer, from time to time you will have direct contact with the clients. This can be in PKI/Root CA ceremonies, POCs or third line trouble shooting, we believe in the concept “you build it you run it”.

Example of things we use are 

Application: Java, Gradle, REST, Docker, Kubernetes

Tools: GIT, Jira, Confluence, SonarQube, Azure Pipelines

Who are you?

We are looking for someone with several years of experience in developing web applications in Java and experienced with cloud technologies and continuous delivery. You enjoy working in an open team and you firmly believe that cooperation and teamwork is the way to succeed. Continuous improvement, working closely together and discussion is the way to learn from each other.

You are a passionate defender of the DevOps mindset and don’t have any issues sharing your ideas and inspiring people around you.

If you also have experience in security, that’s great, however we at least expect a strong interest and willingness to learn!

We take security very seriously and for this role a background check will be mandatory.
